# Anatini.dev

> 50+ free, offline data tools for developers — powered by DuckDB-WASM. All processing happens in your browser. No uploads, no servers, no tracking.

## About

Anatini.dev is a collection of browser-based data tools built on DuckDB-WASM. Every tool runs 100% client-side — your files never leave your machine. The site is free, requires no sign-up, and works offline after first load.

## Tools

### Converters
- [CSV → Parquet](https://anatini.dev/csv-to-parquet): Convert CSV files to Apache Parquet format
- [Parquet → CSV](https://anatini.dev/parquet-to-csv): Convert Parquet files to CSV
- [CSV → JSON](https://anatini.dev/csv-to-json): Convert CSV to JSON arrays or objects
- [JSON → CSV](https://anatini.dev/json-to-csv): Flatten JSON into CSV format
- [JSON → Parquet](https://anatini.dev/json-to-parquet): Convert JSON to Parquet
- [Parquet → JSON](https://anatini.dev/parquet-to-json): Convert Parquet to JSON
- [Excel → CSV](https://anatini.dev/excel-to-csv): Convert Excel (.xlsx/.xls) to CSV
- [CSV → Excel](https://anatini.dev/csv-to-excel): Convert CSV to Excel (.xlsx)
- [YAML → JSON](https://anatini.dev/yaml-to-json): Convert YAML to JSON
- [JSON → YAML](https://anatini.dev/json-to-yaml): Convert JSON to YAML
- [XML → JSON](https://anatini.dev/xml-to-json): Convert XML to JSON
- [JSON → XML](https://anatini.dev/json-to-xml): Convert JSON to XML
- [TOML → JSON](https://anatini.dev/toml-to-json): Convert TOML to JSON
- [JSON → TOML](https://anatini.dev/json-to-toml): Convert JSON to TOML

### Viewers & Formatters
- [Delimited Viewer](https://anatini.dev/csv-viewer): View and explore CSV/TSV files with sorting and filtering
- [Parquet Viewer](https://anatini.dev/parquet-viewer): Browse Parquet files interactively
- [Excel Viewer](https://anatini.dev/excel-viewer): View Excel spreadsheets in the browser
- [JSON Formatter](https://anatini.dev/json-formatter): Pretty-print and format JSON
- [XML Formatter](https://anatini.dev/xml-formatter): Format and indent XML documents
- [YAML Formatter](https://anatini.dev/yaml-formatter): Format YAML documents
- [Log Viewer](https://anatini.dev/log-viewer): Parse and explore log files
- [Hex Viewer](https://anatini.dev/hex-viewer): View binary files in hexadecimal

### Inspectors
- [CSV Inspector](https://anatini.dev/csv-inspector): Analyze CSV structure, types, and quality
- [JSON Inspector](https://anatini.dev/json-inspector): Explore JSON structure and paths
- [Parquet Inspector](https://anatini.dev/parquet-inspector): Inspect Parquet metadata, schema, and row groups

### Analysis & SQL
- [SQL Playground](https://anatini.dev/sql-playground): Query any file with SQL using DuckDB
- [Data Profiler](https://anatini.dev/data-profiler): Generate data quality reports with statistics
- [JSON Flattener](https://anatini.dev/json-flattener): Flatten nested JSON into tabular format
- [Schema Generator](https://anatini.dev/schema-generator): Generate SQL DDL or JSON Schema from data
- [CSV → SQL](https://anatini.dev/csv-to-sql): Generate SQL INSERT statements from CSV
- [Dataset Diff](https://anatini.dev/dataset-diff): Compare two datasets and find differences
- [Data Sampler](https://anatini.dev/data-sampler): Take random or stratified samples from datasets
- [Deduplicator](https://anatini.dev/deduplicator): Find and remove duplicate rows
- [SQL Formatter](https://anatini.dev/sql-formatter): Format and beautify SQL queries
- [Markdown Table](https://anatini.dev/markdown-table): Convert data to Markdown tables
- [Column Editor](https://anatini.dev/column-editor): Rename, reorder, and transform columns
- [Data Merge](https://anatini.dev/data-merge): Join and merge multiple datasets
- [Pivot Table](https://anatini.dev/pivot-table): Create pivot tables from data
- [Chart Builder](https://anatini.dev/chart-builder): Build charts and visualizations from data
- [Regex Filter](https://anatini.dev/regex-filter): Filter rows using regular expressions
- [CSV Splitter](https://anatini.dev/csv-splitter): Split large CSV files into smaller chunks
- [Data Anonymizer](https://anatini.dev/data-anonymizer): Anonymize sensitive columns in datasets
- [Data Generator](https://anatini.dev/data-generator): Generate synthetic test data

### Utilities
- [Base64 Encoder/Decoder](https://anatini.dev/base64): Encode and decode Base64 strings
- [Hash Generator](https://anatini.dev/hash-generator): Generate MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256 hashes
- [JSON Schema Validator](https://anatini.dev/json-schema-validator): Validate JSON against a schema
- [JSON Diff](https://anatini.dev/json-diff): Compare two JSON documents
- [URL Encoder/Decoder](https://anatini.dev/url-encoder): Encode and decode URLs
- [Cron Parser](https://anatini.dev/cron-parser): Parse and explain cron expressions
- [Encoding Detector](https://anatini.dev/encoding-detector): Detect file character encoding

## Key Facts
- All tools are 100% free with no usage limits
- No data leaves the browser — fully offline after first load
- Powered by DuckDB-WASM for SQL-grade performance
- No sign-up, no cookies, no tracking
- Works with CSV, JSON, Parquet, Excel, YAML, XML, TOML, and more

## Sitemap
Full URL list: https://anatini.dev/sitemap.xml
